author: serge
msg: Greatly improved error messages on delivery failure condition.  Message contains friendly note, the actual address that delivery failed (not just the target server), and the error message from that server, usually with the JavaMail stack trace/exception clutter removed.

author: serge
msg: Went hogwild adding relevant RFCs and organized them into directories by protocol.

author: serge
msg: Added support for the "gateway" parameter.  This is an optional single hostname/ip address that ALL outgoing email can be routed to.

author: serge
msg: Added support for the "gateway" parameter.  This is an optional single hostname/ip address that ALL outgoing email can be routed to.

author: charlesb
msg: Rejigged EHLO messages, added isLocalServer method to MailServer interface
